lead_paragraph: The Office of Special Counsel released this report on its investigation into United States Commission for the Preservation of America’s Heritage Abroad and Jeffrey Farrow, a contract employee who had served as its executive director, while also working as a lobbyist.

headline.main: Office of Special Counsel Report to the President
